basics.name: Michael Richardson
basics.label: IT Professional
basics.summary: I am an IT professional with many years of experience with hardware, software, web development and other aspects of information technology. I believe that my experience and more importantly, my love for technology is what set me apart from others.

highlights: Design web graphics, logos, write code, and set up websites for customers
Build custom computers, install & setb up new software and hardware

Cushman and Wakefield is one of the largest property management companies worldwide. My responsibilities are to assist with the operation, troubleshooting, diagnostics, housekeeping, and repairs on commercial buildings, industrial systems, vehicles, grounds, and maintenance equipment for my assigned properties.

Additional tasks I have taken on are the programming and monitoring of the building's automation system, This includes becoming certified by Tridium, and working on our plant's “Engineering Disciplines” documentation, which explain the steps required to perform each maintenance task as a guide for current and future employees.

Oxylance produces oxygen lances and burning bars for different applications. My responsibilities included setting up, testing, and maintaining machinery within the plant using combinations of electrical, mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic, and computer technologies. I also operated a commercial wash tank, overhead crane, and forklift as well as assisted with the company's annual inventory.
One of my greatest accomplishments at Oxylance was attending College full-time and working a 40+ hour week without sacrificing my work quality or my grades.

awards.title: 2016 Cushman & Wakefield Team of the Year
